document.full_text: twitter confirmed on wednesday that it has bought tweetdeck, a popular third-party software application that organizes tweets, the short messages delivered through the online social network.
document.title: twitter buys tweetdeck, terms undisclosed
lines_and_colors: twitter confirmed on wednesday that it has bought tweetdeck, a popular third-party software application that organizes tweets, the short messages delivered through the online social network.
